metadata.name: Tip of the Iceberg
metadata.description:
Part of the " A New AI Hope?" Collection, this piece represents how artificial intelligence will accelerate the 4th Industrial Revolution, which we are currently experiencing.  This new technology will change how we live, ranging from automated diagnostics to automated transportation. Will the general public accept it? Will this cause an ideological or even physical revolt, which happened in all the previous revolutions? 

AI art is just the tip of the iceberg.
